SELECT f.FACTORY_ID,
    f.FACTORY_NAME,
    f.ADDRESS
FROM FOOD_FACTORY f
WHERE ADDRESS LIKE '%ê°•ì›ë„%'
ORDER BY f.FACTORY_ID ASC;
